mapper.select: SELECT MAJOR_ID as id, NAME as name from T_MAJOR M WHERE M.PARENT_ID IS NULL AND M.STATUS=1 ORDER BY M.MAJOR_CODE
SELECT MAJOR_ID as id, NAME as name from T_MAJOR M WHERE M.PARENT_ID = #{parentId} AND M.STATUS=1 ORDER BY M.MAJOR_CODE

SELECT M.MAJOR_ID as id,M.NAME as name FROM T_CERT_TYPE_LINK_EXTEND C LEFT JOIN T_MAJOR M ON C.TARGET_ID=M.MAJOR_ID WHERE C.LINK_ID=(SELECT C.CTL_ID FROM T_CERT_TYPE_LINK C WHERE C.CT_ID = #{certTypeId} AND C.EDU_LEVEL_ID = #{eduLevelId}) AND C.TARGET_TYPE=0
SELECT M.MAJOR_ID as id, M.NAME as name FROM T_MAJOR M WHERE M.PARENT_ID = #{parentId} AND (M.PROVINCE IS NULL OR M.PROVINCE = #{provinceId}) AND M.STATUS = 1 ORDER BY M.MAJOR_CODE
